thread.title: Zuhair Murad designs Sofia Vergara's wedding dress
thread.title_full: Zuhair Murad designs Sofia Vergara's wedding dress - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Zuhair Murad designs Sofia Vergara's wedding dress
text:
"Modern Family" actress Sofia Vergara has entrusted her wedding dress to Lebanese fashion designer Zuhair Murad.
READ: Sofia Vergara's engagement ring is 'perfection'
Vergara, 43, is gearing up for her approaching wedding to actor Joe Manganiello, reported Us Weekly.
Zuhair previously designed Vergara's dress for Oscar and Golden Globe parties.
The actress looked gorgeous in some sequinned dresses designed by Zuhair in the past. For the upcoming nuptials, Vergara will wear a custom-made, fairy-tale frock. Other details about the dress haven't been revealed yet.
Vergara and Manganiello were engaged in Hawaii in December last year. The couple will marry at Florida's Breakers resort in Palm Beach on November 22.
The actress revealed on Jimmy Kimmel Live ! that they would invite 400 guests and use Colombian tradition for the wedding which means there will be no bridesmaids.
